raw_body: SIVAMANI AGUSTYAN (Retd. Teacher – Good Shepherd Convent,​ Kotahena). Beloved wife of late D.P. Agustyan,​ loving mother of Janani,​ mother-in-law of Daylan Sellamuttu and Grandmother of Rukmanthanan. Remains will lie at Mahinda Florist,​ Mount Lavinia from 8.30 a.m on 18th December. Cremation at Mount Lavinia Cemetery at 2 p.m. on the same day.083401
